backend/main.mo: Defines audit logging, user profiles, access control, ICP controller state, and various security-related queries and mutations for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels for ICP Controller and security access updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of multiple frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that handles authentication, role gating for App Controller/Security/ICP Controller, profile setup flow, and routing to dashboards or access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denial UI showing login prompts, principal copy utility, and ICP connection/controls panels for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays detailed audit log information including timestamps, severity, action type, and metadata in a dialog view.
Shows the user's authentication status, principal ID, and backend connectivity with copy and retry actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Manages external broadcasting settings, allowing users to enable alerts and configure an endpoint URL.
Provides a file-based code editor with category selection, unsaved change warnings, apply/reset actions, and file state management.
Explains deployment steps and links to deploy the app on the Caffeine platform with guidance alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with authentication, role badges, and theme toggle using Internet Identity and role queries.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network status, canister info, and connection health with retry and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Manages ICP controller roles, allowing validation, granting, and revoking principals with a table view.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Provides a searchable, category-based catalog of ICP controls with import/export, editing, and reset functions.
Renders an individual ICP control row with appropriate input components based on control type.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and presents the ICP controls catalog with a summary card and navigation anchor.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: Presents an ICP mainnet deployment guide with prerequisites, warnings, and step-by-step instructions. Uses UI cards, alerts, and icons to structure the content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal that prompts the user for their name and saves the profile via a mutation hook. Handles form submission, validation, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Displays real-time security alerts from recent logs and flagged users. Highlights critical and warning events from the last five minutes.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Implements an interactive terminal UI for executing administrative commands with history, permissions, and command registry lookup. Executes commands via actor context and logs results.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Computes and displays security metrics from logs, including critical events, failed logins, and spikes. Shows alerts and a summary dashboard of recent activity.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Provides superuser tools to export audit logs or flagged users, with JSON download and audit recording. Handles export workflows, error states, and user feedback.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI panel for creating and submitting test audit log entries with configurable action types and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Manages user flagging and removal, displaying flagged users and allowing principal ID input actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Performs a lightweight backend connectivity check using the actor and exposes connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Manages ICP control configuration from URL, session storage, and defaults with setters for network, canister ID, and custom controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login handling, identity persistence, and context access for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, audit entries, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Utility functions for getting control definitions, parsing/serializing values, validating input, and generating session storage keys.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines all control categories and control definitions for ICP configuration, serving as the central registry.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Type definitions for control categories, control types, and structures used by the ICP controls registry.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with filters, audit log table, and multiple security and ICP management panels.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Operations dashboard showing ICP connection, auth status, controls, and terminal panels.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the full terminal command registry by combining core commands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Implements core terminal commands including help, clear, and role management with audit logging.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Defines ICP Controller-safe terminal commands such as help, clear, and profile operations with backend/auth checks and audit logging.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides helpers for audit logging, error classification, and backend/auth validation for terminal commands.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for terminal commands, context, output, and history entries.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages file state for the code editor using localStorage, including loading, saving, applying changes, and detecting unsaved edits.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Utility functions for ICP network/canister configuration defaults, validation, and display helpers.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Handles JSON import/export, file download, and validation of ICP Controls configuration objects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides URL and sessionStorage helpers for retrieving, persisting, and cleaning URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, planned features, known issues, and existing feature records for expanding security roles and ICP integration.
